!define HTML_MAIN { {{{
<html>
<title>Button text test</title>
<body>
<button type="button" id="buttonone" title="buttonone">
Text 1
</button>
<div id="someotherplace">
<button type="button" id="buttontwo" title="buttontwo">
Text 2
</button>
</div>
</body>
</html>}}} }


|script      |mock xml server setup|
|add response|${HTML_MAIN}         |
|$url=       |get mock server url  |

|script                |browser test                                                        |
|open                  |$url                                                                |
|seconds before timeout|1                                                                   |
|check                 |text of |xpath=//button[@id="buttonone"]|Text 1                     |
|check                 |text of |css=#buttonone                 |Text 1                     |
|check                 |text of |id=buttonone                   |Text 1                     |
|check                 |text of |buttonone                      |Text 1                     |
|check                 |text of |xpath=.//button                |in|id=someotherplace|Text 2|
|check                 |value of|buttontwo                      |                           |

|script|mock xml server setup|
|stop                        |
